typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: '  SELECT Top(100)
     E003.Code_segment
    ,E003.Poste_segment
    ,E003.Id_transaction
    ,E001.Num_serie
    ,E002.Id_entreprise
    ,E003.Id_paiement
    ,E003.Code_moyen_paiement
    ,E003.Sens_paiement
    ,E003.Montant
    ,10 AS Type_Eqiupment
    ,E001.Date_ope
    ,E000.Plateforme
	,NEWID() AS Unique_Id
  FROM [dbo].[EIS779_SEGMENT_001] E001
  LEFT JOIN [dbo].[EIS779_SEGMENT_002] E002
    ON E001.Id_transaction = E002.Id_transaction
  JOIN [dbo].[EIS779_SEGMENT_003] E003
    ON E001.Id_transaction = E003.Id_transaction
  JOIN [dbo].[EIS779_SEGMENT_000] E000
    ON E000.Code_segment = '000'
  ORDER by E001.id_transaction',
	format: 'query') ~> source1
